What is Outside School Hours Care? famil.answer: About outside school hours care. Page Content. The hours, locations, benefits and different operating models. An outside school hours care (OSHC) service provides education and care for primary school-age children (generally ages 5 to 12 years) outside school hours and during school holidays.
